description:
Interactive entertainment, interactive art, and humancomputer interaction (HCI) design all deal with the ways in which people interact with technology. They
do so, however, from very different and often contradictory perspectives. This module explores the tensions at the intersection of these related approaches to thinking about, designing, and analyzing interactive media. Issues will be explored
through a combination of case studies, theoretical discussions, and project work situated at the intersection of entertainment, art and HCI.
title: Interactive Media Design Capstone Project
